scripts.docker:build: yarn docker:clean && cd ../.. && docker build -t ghcr.io/wired-labs/host -f apps/host/Dockerfile .
scripts.docker:clean: yarn docker:stop && docker rmi ghcr.io/wired-labs/host || true
scripts.docker:start: yarn docker:stop && docker run -e NODE_ENV=development -p 4000:4000 --name wired-host ghcr.io/wired-labs/host
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop wired-host && docker rm wired-host || true
